data.text: “Yaa mana Yaaqoob,
isin warri maqaa magaalaa qulqullittiitiin of waamtan,
Ani wantoota durii duraan dursee dubbadheera;
Ani akka ati mata jabeessa taate beekeen tureetii;
Kanaafuu ani wantoota kanneen bara dheeraan dura sitti himeera;
Ati wantoota kanneen dhageesseerta; isaan hunda ilaali.
Isaan amma uumaman malee bara dheeraan dura miti;
Ati takkumaa dhageessee yookaan hubattee hin beektu;
Ani maqaa kootiif jedhee dheekkamsa koo nan tursiisa;
Kunoo, ani yoo akka meetiitti taʼuu baate iyyuu  si qulqulleesseera;
Ani ofii kootiif jedhee, ofuma kootiif jedhee waan kana nan godha.
“Yaa Yaaqoob, Yaa Israaʼel kan ani si waame,
Harki koo hundeewwan lafaa dhaabe;
“Hundi keessan walitti qabamaatii dhaggeeffadhaa;
Ani, ani mataan koo dubbadheera;
“Natti dhiʼaadhaatii waan kana dhagaʼaa:
Waaqayyo Furiin kee,
Ati utuu ajaja koo qalbeeffattee jiraattee,
Sanyiin kee akkuma cirrachaa,
Baabilon keessaa baʼaa;
Isaan yommuu inni lafa gammoojjii keessa isaan qajeelchetti  hin dheebonne;
“Hamootaaf nagaan hin jiru” jedha Waaqayyo.
